title.narrative: 213 DATA, EVIDENCE AND KNOWLEDGMENT

description.narrative: Data and evidence generation for identifying and monitoring progress, trends and inequities in all programme areas of the Strategic Plan will be strengthened to enhance knowledge management systems in the region., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Comprehensive, sustainable and enabling environment that leaves no child behind is supported by policies, programmes, strategies, budgets and actions of Governments, regional institutions, private sector, media, financial institutions, UN and UNICEF country programmes in South Asia, in development and humanitarian contexts.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Data and evidence generation for identifying and monitoring progress, trends and inequities in all programme areas of the StrategicPlan will be strengthened to enhance knowledge management systems in the region.

description.narrative: ROSA provided technical support to complete the MICS in Pakistan (AJK, Balushstan, KPK, Sindh). In termes of other technical support, ROSA has been able to support countries in finalizing ToR for some rapid assessments (Maldives). KM function: ROSA completed a tailored capacity building on the Fundamentals of KM, contributed to the development of global KM training modules launched in AGORA and COVID-19 lessons have been captured and disseminated. ROSA strengthened KM approaches in the region through the roll out of SAR KM framework and the Global KM strategy including the support to 3 KM Global Strategy Pilot countries in SAR. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/12/2021
